name: Tales of Haroldo
description:
Hi there!!!

In this game you are Haroldo a guy who was trapped in this infinite dungeon by the devil of time itself, you need to fight constantly to steal the lifetime of your opponents to yourself and stay alive while you try to escape!

Controls:

- Use the keyboard arrows to move.
- Use Z to attack.
- Use S to open shop.
- Use M to mute the song, but the SFX keep going.

Tips;

- If you run fast enough, you can run from your enemies
- You will fail, and that's ok, try to remember where all things are for your next run
- Every time you finish the zombies level, your enemies get stronger, remember to upgrade!
- The sound will start REALLY loud, if you are using headphones, I recommend you lower your volume, and after you start the game, adjust it accordingly
- Use S to pause the game if you need some time to breathe!

Know bugs:

- Sometimes you will get your foot stuck in a hole in the floor, just do a side step and you can free yourself!
- In rare cases, a demon or a zombie may want to leave and simple goes flying... just pretend you didn't see that heresy
- Sometimes you press S and the Shop don't close, just click with your mouse on the background, click S again, and you are good to go!
